FlavorTextOption.Text: The engineering crew on one of our freighters has found a way to greatly enhance Life Support systems. Unfortunately, this news has been leaked to other races already. The commander of the vessel would seem likely to share this breakthrough with them unless we intervene.
Let them share the technology. Perhaps it will buy us some good will. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +25, Diplomacy + 9, +100% Ship Range to everyone's ships) [/COLOR]

Since the cat is already out of the bag, insist that the Commander gets a fair price for sharing the knowledge. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +25, Credits +2500, +100% Ship Range to everyone's ships)[/COLOR]
Take the crew into custody and make sure that the details of this breakthrough are only shared with our researchers. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +25, +100% Ship Range to our ships)[/COLOR]
